author: Ryan Daws
description:
Security researchers from Socket have found that a group of attackers has been exploiting the RubyGems code repository for over two years, turning seemingly helpful tools into password-stealing malware. We build amazing things using shared, open-source code, trusting that the building blocks we use are safe. But the discovery by Socket is a reminder of […]

The post RubyGems malware campaign steals passwords appeared first on Developer Tech News.
title: RubyGems malware campaign steals passwords
